ValidationRule.description: On creation of a record prevent the Owner being set to an Inactive user or a System user (where Owner Region = BLANK).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE, ISNEW(), OR( Owner__r.IsActive = FALSE, ISBLANK(TEXT(Owner__r.Region__c)) /* Where Owner Region is blank we deem this to be a System User so do not allow it */ ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunity Service Owner must be an Active User and cannot be a System User
